# praiseme

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

Deliver praise to someone!

## Installation

You can install this package from:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("nzh-zhou/praiseme")
```
## Deliver praise

Here's how to give praise to your favourite Asian:

```{r}
library(praiseme)
praise("Nathan")
```
